metadata.title: CVE-2021-29960 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Firefox used to cache the last filename used for printing a file. Whengenerating a filename for printing, Firefox usually suggests the web pagetitle. The caching and suggestion techniques combined may have lead to thetitle of a website visited during private browsing mode being stored ondisk. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
